# Usage

## Set of example recipes

```{r recipebook-example}

recipebook <- RecipeBook_example

recipes(recipebook) %>% head()

```

## Set your favourite recipes

```{r set-favourite}

favourites(recipebook) <- 1:3

recipes(recipebook) %>% head()

```

## Create a meal plan

```{r create-meal-plan}

meal_plan(recipebook) <- create_meal_plan(
  recipebook, 
  fav_only = TRUE
)

meal_plan(recipebook)

```
